name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Edward BRACEY, Petitioner
docket_number: Emergency Motion No. 0026 Capital Appeal Docket

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Edward BRACEY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of December, 1995, upon consideration of petitioner’s emergency motion for a stay of execution pending the filing and resolution of a petition for a writ of certiorari, and the Commonwealth’s representation that it takes no position on this application, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that petitioner’s application is GRANTED and his execution will be stayed pending action by the United States Supreme Court on his petition for writ of certiorari from this Court’s ruling in Commonwealth v. Bracey, 541 Pa. 322, 662 A.2d 1062 (1995).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 882
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Edward BRACEY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 1, 1995.
